articles.description: The work of cancer campaigners Dame Deborah James, Rachael Bland and Lauren Mahon has been honoured at the British Podcast Awards.
articles.content: The work of cancer campaigners Dame Deborah James, Rachael Bland and Lauren Mahon has been honoured at the British Podcast Awards after their offering - You, Me and the Big C - scooped the podcast ch… [+4369 chars]

articles.author: Pete Volk
articles.title: SDCC 2022 trailers: Black Adam embraces the Rock’s dark side - Polygon
articles.description: The Rock’s upcoming DC superhero movie Black Adam got a new trailer at San Diego Comic-Con 2022, with friends like Pierce Brosnan’s Doctor Fate.
articles.content: Even superheroes need friends

articles.author: Jacqueline Lindenberg
articles.title: Ricky Martin performs at The Hollywood Bowl...after winning court battle against nephew - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ricky Martin performed at The Hollywood Bowl after winning a court battle against his 21-year-old nephew who accused the award-winning singer of sexual abuse and of stalking.
articles.content:
Ricky Martin gave a celebratory performance alongside the L.A. Philharmonic Orchestra Friday night at the Hollywood Bowl. 
The Puerto Rican singer, 50, made his first public appearance after his rec… [+3674 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: John Wick 4's first trailer questions when it all ends - The Verge
articles.description: At San Diego Comic-Con 2022 fans got a first glimpse at John Wick 4 in a new trailer, which stars Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Donnie Yen, and Bill Skarsgård. It’s coming to theaters in March 2023.
